mapper.insert: insert into app (app_id, app_secret, domain, created_time, updated_time) values (#{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select app_id, app_secret, domain, created_time, updated_time from app
